text: geu an-eneun bunmyeonghan jingpyodeul-in ibeulahim(abeulaham)ui didimdol-i issnola. geuligo nugungaga geu an-eulo deul-eogandamyeon geuneun anjeonhan jala. ingan-egeneun hananim-eul wihae geu jib(halam seong-won)euloui seongjisunlye(hasjeu)ga uimuga doeeoss-euni geugos-eulo gil-eul tteonal neunglyeog-eul gajchun ja-ege geuleohanola. bulsinhaneun jaga issdamyeon sillo hananimkkeseoneun geu eotteon ido pil-yochi anh-eusin bun-ila
